verses.verse: Now <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H6086>timber<s%> of <S%H730>cedars,<s%> with <S%H2796>masons<s%> <S%H7023><s%> and <S%H2796>carpenters,<s%> <S%H6086><s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> him an <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H3559>confirmed<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> was <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up on <S%H4605>high,<s%> <S%H5668>because<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H3205>children<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1961>had<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H8051>Shammua,<s%> and <S%H7727>Shobab,<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%>

And when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, and <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H6640>against<s%> them.
And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6584>spread<s%> themselves in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Shall I <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%> And will you <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand?<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5927>Go<s%> up; for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

So they <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H1188>Baalperazim;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> them <S%H8033>there.<s%> Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6555>broken<s%> in on my <S%H341>enemies<s%> by my <S%H3027>hand<s%> like the <S%H6556>breaking<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> of <S%H4325>waters:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1188>Baalperazim.<s%>
And when they had <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> gave a <S%H559>commandment,<s%> and they were <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Therefore <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5927>Go<s%> not up <S%H310>after<s%> them; <S%H5437>turn<s%> away from them, and <S%H935>come<s%> on them <S%H4136>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H1057>mulberry<s%> trees.

And it shall be, when you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> a <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H6807>going<s%> in the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H1057>mulberry<s%> trees, that <S%H227>then<s%> you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out to <S%H4421>battle:<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> therefore <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him: and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> even to <S%H1507>Gazer.<s%>

And the <S%H8034>fame<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out into <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H776>lands;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>brought<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of him on <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
